_header: Be it true or be it false / It is as the copy was
_description: Concluding rubric by the scribe concerning the poems copied — one couplet

NLS1931.Transcription: Be it trowe or be it falsit is os the Cope was

Accompanying 3184, in a different hand from
                    the text.
